title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This powerful and convenient cleaning solution is perfect for all your hard floors and area rugs. With its rotating brush system and improved edge cleaning, you can easily remove dirt and debris from every corner of your home.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max features a swivel head and carry handle, making it easy to maneuver and transport. The cordless design allows for hassle-free cleaning without any limitations. Powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion battery, it provides up to 30 minutes of cleaning time on a single charge.

This versatile cleaner is compatible with a variety of surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. The large clean tank capacity of 28 oz for water and 18.6 oz for dirt ensures continuous cleaning without frequent refills.

With its WiFi connectivity and BISSELL Connect app compatibility, you can control and monitor your cleaning sessions with ease. The self-cleaning cycle keeps the machine in top condition, and the two-tank technology separates clean and dirty water for optimal performance.

To support a great cause, the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is proud to contribute to the BISSELL Pet Foundation. By purchasing this product, you're helping to make a difference in the lives of animals in need.

Included with the cleaner are 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls, ensuring you have everything you need to achieve a thorough and hygienic clean.

Experience the convenience and efficiency of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. Say goodbye to confusion and hello to a cleaner home!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This powerful cleaning device is designed to make your life easier and more convenient. 

With its rotating brush system, it effectively cleans all types of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. It has a wide cleaning path width of 10.5 inches, ensuring efficient and thorough cleaning.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is cordless, allowing you to move freely without the hassle of cords. Its 36V Lithium-Ion battery provides up to 30 minutes of cleaning time, ensuring you can clean multiple rooms without interruption.

Featuring improved edge cleaning, this device reaches even the tightest corners and edges, leaving no dirt or dust behind. The swivel head and carry handle make it easy to maneuver and transport around your home.

The clean tank has a capacity of 28 oz for water and 18.6 oz for dirt, ensuring you can clean a large area without frequent refills or emptying. Plus, it has a self-cleaning cycle, making maintenance a breeze.

Connectivity is made easy with its WiFi capabilities. You can control and monitor the device through the BISSELL Connect app, making cleaning more convenient than ever.

By purchasing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, you are also supporting a good cause. BISSELL Pet Foundation, a charitable organization, is supported by this product.

Included with the device are 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls, ensuring you have everything you need for a thorough clean.

Experience the convenience and efficiency of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. It's the perfect cleaning companion for your hard floors and area rugs.
